main event: Eleven objects were reported maneuvering above an observation point in Roy, Utah.
interesting points: The objects were observed for 15-20 minutes,The objects were described as disc-shaped and had a definite edge,They were noted to be following an aircraft,The sighting included both individual and collective maneuvers,Unusual behavior was reported on radar during the sighting.
witness description: mature individuals including a job corps supervisor and a housewife
